data.title: Home - Meadows Field Airport BFL
data.meta_description: Meadows Field Airport located in Bakersfield, California offers stress free, affordable flights on American and United Airlines. Fly local to anywhere with a stop or two.
data.meta_site_name: Meadows Field Airport BFL | Kern County, California

PARKING

LOST & FOUND

BOOK A FLIGHT

AIRLINE INFO

TRANSPORTATION

A BETTER WAY TO TRAVEL

“Meadows Field is the easiest way to travel”

When you want or need to fly, Meadows Field Airport provides you with the best combination of convenience, price, and service.

Meadows Field Airport

No trouble with traffic jams

No accidents delaying your arrival to the airport

Easy parking options

Short walk to the William Thomas Terminal building

Short lines at ticketing to check-in and check your luggage

Short lines at TSA Security Screening Checkpoint

Quick walk to your gate

Other Airports

Plan extra time for traffic and accidents delaying your arrival to the airport

Cut a day off your vacation staying at a hotel overnight near your flight out

Add in those expensive parking costs or far away parking options

Wait for the bus to ride to the terminal

How much fun are the long lines at ticketing to check-in and check your luggage?

Add more time for getting through TSA Security Screening Checkpoint

You might have to sprint all the way to your gate to make it on time before they close the door to the plane.

Traveling by air requires following a departure schedule that implies getting to the passenger gate on time. When you travel from Meadows Field Airport, its almost like having your flight parked in your neighborhood. You don’t have to start 4-6 hours before your flight, just get to the airport before departure (check with your carrier on times). Parking is right across the street, and every step in the process is relatively quick. It is now even faster if you use your carrier’s mobile application. Flying from Meadows Field Airport is the best way to ENJOY traveling. You are worth it and the cost is reasonable.

TRUE COST CALCULATOR

Fly Local. Save Money. Get the True Cost of Flying.

We are happy to introduce a new travel calculator! In this new version, we have partnered with a booking service to pull real-time values from our carriers for travel to your destination. The comparison then allows you to identify any difference on cost of travel from Meadows Field Airport and the comparable cost for flying from a different city. Save the time and anxiety that accompanies having to hit the highway before making it to another airport and use instead Meadows Field Airport in your trip planning. If the price is right, you can click through to the travel website and buy your tickets online right away! This new travel calculator is a novel method to compare originating departure points which the airlines and travel aggregators do not generally offer. The Airport hopes that you will find it useful in planning your travels and helpful in fostering loyalty to using your hometown airport, Meadows Field.
